description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. There is a collapse at the San Marino Mines!  Join the Miner Rescue Team to save the trapped miners before it is too late.  Explore 80 dangerous puzzle-filled levels in this addictive 3D adventure.
description.short: There is a collapse at the San Marino Mines!  Join the Miner Rescue Team to save the trapped miners before it is too late.  Explore 80 dangerous puzzle-filled levels in this addictive 3D adventure.
